snippet.title: Phantom: Covert Ops  |  Oculus Rift Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
BEST VR GAME OF E3 2019 - GAME CRITICS AWARDS

You are a Phantom: an elite covert operative with one night to prevent all-out war. 

Dispatched into hostile wetlands in your tactical kayak, utilise military weapons and equipment to evade and neutralise the enemy threat. Engage your targets lethally or infiltrate unnoticed from the shadows: it’s your mission to execute your way. Phantom: Covert Ops is stealth action redefined.

DEADLIER ON WATER
Freely move in your military kayak. Experience innovative on-water VR traversal to paddle stealthily through hostile locations.

BECOME A PHANTOM
Experience the tension of becoming a lethal military asset. From dragging your paddle through water to aiming down a rifle, everything is driven through your movement delivering new levels of immersion.

STEALTH ACTION
How you plan and execute missions is your choice. Move silently across water, sneaking through reeds and beneath walkways, or ambush hostiles in exhilarating combat.

https://www.oculus.com/blog/first-look-phantom-covert-ops-running-on-oculus-rift-s/
